name: SpaceDefence
description:
The game is yet in development, most features work not as intended or probably wont work at all ;D.

WASD - movement, space to take off and fly. Left mouse shoot, RMB aim

Shift - turbo thrusters

in air QE rotates, Tab emergency stabilize, Ctrl/space up and down. 

Ctrl will dock you to surface if any is close under feet.

F- interact.

Our team had much less free time to work on the project then we planned to, so the game will probably be finished with a delay. 

PS the game is full of bugs now, be prepared! XD
